about_the_game:
"YOUR OWN TWO FEET"

Experience three of the more step-step-heavy-walking levels in this demo. Consider this an early access of sorts. Things are subject to change, but you know that already.

SWEYET

Explore a series of diverse, mechanically driven dreamscapes. SWEYET(etc.) is a single player (always), first person (generally), game (mostly). SWEYET uses optional eye tracking technology utilizing your everyday webcam. Through the physical action of real-life blinking, the world changes around you, drawing inspiration from the unpredictable nature of the films that play in our heads between each day.


                

THE FAMILIAR DISCOMFORT

Dreamscapes are connected, with your path branching based on the outcome of each world. The puzzles within opt for a new approach, typically obscuring controls, forcing one to think outside the box and confront their relationship with gaming and their expectation of "control".


                

THE UNPREDICTABLE

Meet and help the unique characters that occupy these worlds to discover the connections that lay beneath. Help them, and maybe they will help you...

THANKS FOR READING, HOPE TO SEE YOU SOON!

name: SWEYET: DREAMING EMULATOR: THE FAMILIAR DISCOMFORT OF THE UNPREDICTABLE: DEMO

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 10
  • Additional Notes: Webcam optional for best experience.

short_description: Begin learning how to live without control while solving dynamic dream scape that change through real-life blinks. Maybe one day you'll get there?
